resources.string: Welcome to LikeBox! If you\'ve ever had a burning desire to tell someone you know you want to be more than just friends, but are too afraid to because you don\'t know if they feel the same way? Then, you\'re in the right place! LikeBox lets you like people in your contacts, but doesn\'t notify them until they like you back. The button on the right will lead you to a list of all your contacts; the button on your left to a list of your likes and mutual likes.
Username must be at lesat 4 characters
Already have an account? Log In Here
